desc: In the closing days of the war between gods and humanity, Reed, Lucana, and Aneil attempted to save survivors. They led the people with them as they headed for Mistral, the site of the promised land. The group encountered Rhein, Eru, and Nevsky along the way, and together they managed to make it to where the promised land was just ahead. But Mistral was also home to a threatening presence...
name: Those Who Lead
